title: In-app static ZIP download for full project source code

requirements.summary: Add a static downloadable ZIP containing the full project source under the site’s public assets.
acceptanceCriteria: A ZIP file containing the full project source (including both `frontend/` and `backend/`) is added under `frontend/public/assets/downloads/` (or equivalent static public directory) and is served as a static asset by the deployed site.
The ZIP downloads successfully in the browser and unzips without errors.
The ZIP includes the current landing page code (not an empty placeholder).

file_operations.description: Add the prebuilt ZIP artifact containing the current full repository source tree (must include both `frontend/` and `backend/`) as a static public asset so it is served by the deployed site.
Add an exported constant (e.g., SOURCE_CODE_ZIP_PATH) that points to the static asset path under `frontend/public/assets/downloads/` so UI can reference it from a single place.

requirements.summary: Expose the ZIP download via a clearly labeled footer link/button with a one-line instruction.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer renders a visible control labeled in English (e.g., “Download source code (ZIP)”).
Clicking the control downloads the ZIP from the static asset path added in REQ-1.
The link uses safe attributes when appropriate (e.g., no navigation away from the landing page is required; if opening a new tab is used, `rel="noopener noreferrer"` is set).

file_operations.description: Add a clearly labeled download control (e.g., “Download source code (ZIP)”) in the footer and a one-line instruction indicating it downloads the full project source; wire the href to the shared path constant from `frontend/src/config/landing.ts` and use safe link attributes as appropriate.
